# column

**Instance Property**

The index of the column that contains the error.

## Declaration

```swift
var column: String? { get }
```

## Getting Error Information

- **row**: The index of the row that contains the error.
- **CSVWritingError.badEncoding(row:column:_:)**: An error that indicates CSV data contains an invalid UTF-8 byte sequence.

items.description: The index of the row that contains the error.
